titleStmt.title: The secret history of the confederacy, &c. discovered in a conference between the French King and his chief officers. To which is added, articles between Luxemburgh, &c. As also expedients proposed for a peace. / Translated out of French.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Richard Baldwin, at the Oxford-Arms Inn in Warwick-lane,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: faded print with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
